hero.subtitle: Excellence in maritime services since inception
hero.description: We are committed to providing world-class maritime solutions with a focus on safety, reliability, and innovation.

qualityOfService.title: Quality of Service
qualityOfService.desc1: Wheelhouse not only delivers high-quality services but also accompanies clients comprehensively throughout their entire journey. Our experienced engineers proactively identify and strive to resolve issues before they impact equipment operations.
qualityOfService.desc2: With dedication, expertise, and smart workflows, clients can be fully confident that every need is prioritized, and service quality is consistently maintained at the highest level.

repairMaintenance.title: Repair & Maintenance
repairMaintenance.intro: Professional repair and maintenance services for <bold>maritime electronic equipment</bold>.
repairMaintenance.desc1: A ship's officer in today's maritime environment relies on a wide range of <bold>marine electronic equipment</bold> to ensure the safety of the vessel and its crew, while successfully completing missions at sea. Cutting-edge marine electronics has made the journey at sea <bold>smoother and safer</bold>.
repairMaintenance.desc2: You need the best services to keep your ship’s equipment in optimal working order without negatively impacting your financial bottom line. Wheelhouse is ready to provide <bold>maintenance and repair services</bold> that ensure your equipment operates reliably and efficiently, at the <bold>most cost-effective approach possible</bold>.
